X-PLUG/mPLUG-DocOwl

Document understanding via LLMs without OCR

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • open-source tool for parsing PDFs, Word, and PowerPoint for LLMs
  • PDF processing toolkit for LLMs
  • LLM-powered pipelines for complex document processing
  • extracts text from documents and images using OCR
  • Converts plain text into ffmpeg commands using LLMs
  • visually chunks and parses complex documents for LLMs, with markdown and table support
  • OCR pipeline with local LLM field extraction
  • Converts PDF documents to Markdown and Word formats
  • Organizes documents with machine learning and OCR
